sentences.pinyin: tā shì zhè ge shè de chéng yuán.
sentences.translation: He is a member of this society.

sentences.simplifiedText: 作为学生社的一员，他积极参与社的各类活动。
sentences.traditionalText: 作為學生社的一員，他積極參與社的各類活動。
sentences.pinyin: zuò wéi xué shēng shè de yī yuán, tā jī jí cān yù shè de gè lèi huó dòng.
sentences.translation: As a member of the student society, he actively participates in various activities of the society.
